channel.title: Free Moderator Spot To Whoever
channel.description:
Okay, listen. I've been trying for at least a month now. I'm serious.
I'm trying to run a server, I just want other people to play. I did it last year, my friends could play on my server. But, we decided to quit. I don't know why, but whatever.
Right now, I'm running no-ip, I'm running the source (It's richscape source), and I'm running Utorrent. Now, my friends still can't log in, they still get that fucking "error connecting to server". It's getting anoying, really. I'm sick and tired of this fucking error.
So, whoever that can help me; will get a free moderator spot + any items in-game (your choice).
I just want you guys to help me. I really, really, really want my friends to play! But no! they always get that fucking error connecting to server.
So, help as soon as possible, please.
PS: Don't say "use the search button". I'll just ignore your post.
You'll probably say "Yeah, there's like 50+ threads; same question". Yeah, well guess what? I've searched it, and the only answer I see is... You're not running the server. Well, I'm not stupid, and I'm not blind. I think I know if I'm running the server or not. So please, help.
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Free Moderator Spot To Whoever
item.dc:creator: @Macoronizer Macoronizer
item.description:
@Macoronizer wrote:

Hmm ... Same problem here :/ tried to use utorrent. Piece of crap . Piracy is crap. Anyway. I think my dad changed the password , but won't give it to me because he's scared the computer might crash. I can't even check my mail on his laptop due to he's scared I might open a mail with a virus, - if you're that scared, update your firewall from 2002. - why ? It's nothing wrong with it. - more harder and stealthfullier virus creates every month. - anyway. What's the password for our gateway ? - never heard of it. - dude. I checked the box that bellongs to the gateway. The standard pass is admin. It doesn't work... - hey ! Yournt autuorized to try stuff like that! The gateway might crash! - dad! You wanted to have a new router three weka ago! - son, they're expensive... - since you bought you're boat you cant even pay my monthly "salary". Just some conversation me and my dad had. He hates that I'm making my server. I mean , its no use that I try making one, he won't give me the password. I'm doomed to not do the things I want. Please help me. Even you, that thinks you're so good because your server is up and running. Dude, srsly, I need your help !

// victor

Wtf?

Anyways, come on guys. Any help as soon as possible would be appreciated, and gets a free moderator spot.

Here, watch the video, and tell me what I’m doing wrong. http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2uxuurb&s=3

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Macoronizer Macoronizer
item.description:
@Macoronizer wrote:

No, because where he puts his username and password, under that, there’s a port thing. It says: port: 43594

So, it’s not that. Unfortunately. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 24, 2009, 04:10:18 pm[/size][hr]Here’s a video.

http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2uxuurb&s=3

Tell me what I’m doing wrong, please.

item.title: Free Moderator Spot To Whoever
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

[quote=“Macoronizer, post:10, topic:290747”]I have speedstream 6520 for a modem. I tried to portfoward, but it just doesn’t work!

Also, I reinstalled Utorrent, still doesn’t work. Gets that error connecting to server.

And I changed the Ip to mine in client.java. Also, I changed source, I’m using delta as the source, and I’m using richscape v4 for the client. That doesn’t do anything, right?

And pur3pk3r4, it’s unchecked.[/quote]

Well, yes, it might do something. You changed your source and the port of RichScape is 5555. DeltaScape is 43594 I think or you choose it automaticly.

Read full topic

item.title: Free Moderator Spot To Whoever
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

[quote=“123kdd100, post:4, topic:290747”]i know exactly whats happening!
do what Maximum said then go to the Client.java search .no-ip
replace it with ur ip compile reset server.
And btw i thought richscape was port 5555 lolz try using another source.[/quote]

You can change the port of a Server if you want. Just change it in Run, Compiler or client.java.

item.title: Free Moderator Spot To Whoever
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

First, delete Utorrent and reinstall it.

After, Run your server.

Finally, go in Utorrent and press Ctrl + P. You’ll get to “Connection”. Type 43594 in port, and click in the last two box. I mean the two box that are in the last rank.

Box (The Y are the box) (The arrows are the box that you need to click.

Y Y
Y <— Y <—

Click Apply and click OK.

It should work perfectly.

If it doesn’t work again, add my msn: ineedhelpfrugooscape@hotmail.com

Thanks, ~Jordan.

Read full topic
